thread.section_title: CarRental8 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarRental8 | carrental8.com | 5 of 86
thread.title: Keith

author: Keith
title: Keith
text: I was looking for a rental at the John Wayne Airport in April. I checked AAA and AARP, plus Kayak and a host of other sites. When I went directly to the airport sight, I found CarRental8. I had not heard of the business before, but they represented a number of companies at the terminal, which is what we wanted. We didn't went to have to be shuttled off site. We found a car a at the best price, which turned out to be Dollar. I had checked around and CarRental8 had THE best prices for the four days we needed the car. This will be the first place we check next time we need the service. Everything was done online and was quick and easy. Highly recommended.
